subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Larry Sherry's brilliant relief pitching in his rookie season with the Los Angeles Dodgers propelled them to all four of their victories over the Chicago White Sox in the 1959 World Series.
snippet: Larry Sherry's brilliant relief pitching in his rookie season with the Los Angeles Dodgers propelled them to all four of their victories over the Chicago White Sox in the 1959 World Series.
